name: Smoky Turkey and Multi-bean Chili

ingredients.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix or Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
Poco Picante Salsa Mix or Guacamole Dip Mix
Chipotle Aioli Mix or Chili Seasoning

preparation: Heat Multipurpose Pot over medium-high heat. Add oil and cook turkey until lightly browned.
Add green pepper, mushrooms and 3 Onion Dip Mix. Continue cooking for 3 minutes.
Add remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Reduce temperature to low and simmer chili for 30 minutes. Season with Sea Salt and Black Pepper.
tips: Top steaming bowls of chili with grated cheese and a dollop of sour cream or Guacamole.
Serve with Southern Cornmeal Muffins and a green salad.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Chipotle Aioli Mix
summary: Medium-spicy Southwestern flavor with noteworthy chipotle chili and smoked paprika. A crowd-pleasing condiment for your burgers, fries, fish tacos, burritos and anything else that needs a little extra kick.

products.name: Chili Seasoning (1001136)
summary: Make classic, restaurant-quality chili at home with better-for-you ingredients.
